00050     void setData(uint8_t* start){
00051         start_ = start;

00058     vtnum_t getMatchedCount(){
00059         if(!start_) return 0;
00060         return *reinterpret_cast<vtnum_t*>(start_);
00061     }
00062 
00071     vtnum_t getSynonymCount(int index){
00072         if(!start_) return 0;
00073 
00074         uint32_t off = index * VT_OFFSET_LEN + VT_NUM_LEN;
00075         vtoffset_t offset = *reinterpret_cast<vtoffset_t*>(start_ + off);
00076         return *reinterpret_cast<vtnum_t*>(start_ + offset);
00077     }
00078 
00083     char* getWord(int index, int offset){
00084         //first offset
00085         uint32_t off = VT_NUM_LEN + index * VT_OFFSET_LEN;
00086         vtoffset_t woffset = *reinterpret_cast<vtoffset_t*>(start_ + off);
00087 
00088         //second offset
00089         off = VT_NUM_LEN + offset * VT_OFFSET_LEN;
00090         woffset = *reinterpret_cast<vtoffset_t*>(start_ + woffset + off);
00091         return (char*)(start_ + woffset);
00092     }
00093 
00101     char* getHeadWord( int index){
00102         return getWord(index, 0);
00103     }
00104 
00109     vtnum_t size(){
00110         if(!start_)
00111             return 0;
00112         size_t ret = 0;
00113         vtnum_t size1 = getMatchedCount();
00114         ret += VT_NUM_LEN + size1 * VT_OFFSET_LEN;
00115         for(vtnum_t i=0; i<size1; ++i){
00116             vtnum_t size2 = getSynonymCount(i);
00117             ret += VT_NUM_LEN + size2 * VT_OFFSET_LEN;
00118             for(vtnum_t j=0; j<size2; ++j){
00119                 ret += strlen(getWord(i, j)) + 1;
00120             }
00121         }
00122 
00123         return ret;
00124     }
00125 
00126     friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& sout, VSynonym& retUnit ){
00127         if(!retUnit.start_)
00128             return sout;
00129         vtnum_t max1 = retUnit.getMatchedCount() - 1;
00130         for(vtnum_t i=0; i<=max1; ++i){
00131             vtnum_t max2 = retUnit.getSynonymCount(i) - 1;
00132             for(vtnum_t j=0; j<=max2; ++j){
00133                 //cout<<"print "<<i<<","<<j<<endl;
00134                 if(j != max2 || i != max1){
00135                     sout<<retUnit.getWord(i, j)<<",";
00136                 }else{
00137                     sout<<retUnit.getWord(i, j);
00138                 }
00139             }
00140         }
00141         return sout;
00142     }
00143 
00147     void testLoop(){
00148         if(!start_)
00149             return;
00150         vtnum_t max1 = getMatchedCount() - 1;
00151         for(vtnum_t i=0; i<=max1; ++i){
00152             vtnum_t max2 = getSynonymCount(i) - 1;
00153             for(vtnum_t j=0; j<=max2; ++j){
00154                 getWord(i, j);
00155             }
00156         }
00157     }

00162 };

00179     virtual ~VSynRetUnit(){

00193     {

00198         }

00337     void get_synonyms( const string& key, VSynonym& synonym ){
00338         VTrieNode node;
00339         if(trie_->search(key.data(), &node)){
00340             synonym.setData(value_ + node.data);

00343         }

00369     VSynonym* get_synonyms(const string& key){

00371         if(trie_->search(key.data(), &node)){
00372             return new VSynonym(value_ + node.data);

00374             return NULL;

00382     VExpandedQuery* expandQuery(const string& query){
00383         VExpandedQuery *ret = new VExpandedQuery();
00384         string lower = toLower(query);
00385         vector<size_t>* tokens1 = findTokens(lower,true);
00386         vector<size_t>& tokens = *tokens1;
00387         size_t size = tokens.size();
00388         if(size <= 1)
00389             return ret;
00390 
00391         size_t start = 1;
00392         size_t lastEndIndex = 0; //exclude
00393 
00394         while(start < size){
00395             size_t subStartIndex = tokens[start-1]+1;
00396             string head = lower.substr(subStartIndex,tokens[start]-tokens[start-1]);
00397             //cout<<"Check head "<<head<<endl;
00398             int offset = getFromLengthMap(head, size-start) - 1;
00399             while(offset >= 0){
00400                 string key = lower.substr(subStartIndex,tokens[start+offset]-tokens[start-1]);
00401                 //cout<<"Check Key "<<key<<endl;
00402                 VSynonym* syn = get_synonyms(key);
00403                 if(syn == NULL){
00404                     --offset;
00405                     continue;
00406                 }
00407 
00408                 if(lastEndIndex < subStartIndex){
00409                     ret->addUnit(new VSynRetUnit(
00410                         new string(query.substr(lastEndIndex,subStartIndex-lastEndIndex))));
00411                 }
00412                 lastEndIndex = subStartIndex + tokens[start+offset] - tokens[start-1];
00413                 ret->addUnit(new VSynRetUnit(syn));
00414                 //cout<<"Find Key "<<key<<endl;
00415                 break;
00416             }
00417 
00418             if(offset < 0)
00419                 ++start;
00420             else
00421                 start += offset + 1;
00422         }
00423 
00424         if(lastEndIndex < query.length()){
00425             ret->addUnit(new VSynRetUnit(
00426                         new string(query.substr(lastEndIndex,query.length()-lastEndIndex))));
00427         }
00428 
00429 
00430         return ret;
00431     }
00432 
00433     VTrie* getData(){
00434         return trie_;
00435     }

00442     int loadSynonyms(const char* pathDic){
00443         if( synonymDelim_ == wordDelim_){
00444             cerr << "Because delimeter among synonyms and delimiter among "<<
00445                 "words are same, Can't not load synonym dictionary.\n"<<
00446                 "Please set delimiters differentlty.\n";
00447             return 0;
00448         }
00449 
00450         ifstream fin(pathDic);
00451         if( fin.fail())
00452         {
00453             cerr << "Can't open " << pathDic << " file." << endl;
00454             return 0;
00455         }
00456 
00457         string line;
00458         lengthMap_ = new map<string, size_t>();
00459 
00460         const char* synoDelim = synonymDelim_.c_str();
00461 
00462         VTrieNode node; //for intValue
00463         while( !fin.eof() )
00464         {
00465             getline(fin, line);
00466             trimSelf(line);
00467             if(line.size() <= 0)
00468                 continue;
00469 
00470             replaceAll(line, wordDelim_, " ");
00471             vector<string> synvec;
00472             tokenizeAndLowerCase(synvec, line, synoDelim);
00473 
00474             size_t vecLen = synvec.size();
00475             //one synonym make no sense
00476             if(vecLen <= 1)
00477                 continue;
00478 
00479             //the starting address for those only has one synonym entry
00480             int value = 0;
00481             set<string> keySet;
00482             for(size_t i=0; i<vecLen; ++i){
00483                 string& key = synvec[i];
00484                 //avoid duplicate keys
00485                 if(keySet.find(key) == keySet.end()){
00486                     keySet.insert(key);
00487                 }else{
00488                     continue;
00489                 }
00490                 size_t keyLoginLen = computeLength(key, true);
00491                 //update the length map
00492                 if(keyLoginLen > MinLen && (*lengthMap_)[key] < keyLoginLen){
00493                     (*lengthMap_)[key] = static_cast<int>(keyLoginLen);
00494                 }
00495                 node.init();
00496                 //more than one synonym
00497                 if(trie_->search(key.data(), &node)){
00498                     node.data = appendValue(synvec, node.data);
00499                 }
00500                 //only one synonym entry value not set
00501                 else if(value <= 0){
00502                     node.data = appendValue(synvec, 0);
00503                     value = node.data;
00504                 }
00505                 else{
00506                     node.data = value;
00507                 }
00508                 
00509                 assert(node.data);
00510                 trie_->insert(key.data(), &node);
00511             }
00512         }
00513 
00514         return 1;
00515     }
00516 
00520     size_t size(){
00521         return sizeof(this) + valueSize_ + trie_->size();
00522     }

00528     inline size_t getFromLengthMap(const string& key, size_t maxValue){
00529         size_t ret = static_cast<size_t>((*lengthMap_)[key]);
00530         ret = ret > MinLen ? ret : MinLen;
00531         return ret >= maxValue ? maxValue : ret;
00532     }
00533 
00534     inline void removeDuplicate(vector<string> & vec){
00535         std::sort(vec.begin(), vec.end());
00536         vector<string>::iterator new_end = std::unique(vec.begin(),vec.end());
00537 
00538         vec.erase(new_end, vec.end());
00539     }
00540 
00541     void init(){
00542         valueSize_ = 1;
00543         value_ = (uint8_t*)malloc(valueSize_);
00544         //reserve the first TRIE
00545         endValPtr_ = value_ + 1;
00546         trie_ = new VTrie();
00547     }
00548 
00552     int appendValue(vector<string>& vec, int origData){
00553         VSynonym origSyn;
00554         if(origData > 0){
00555             origSyn.setData(value_ + origData);
00556         }
00557 
00558         // 1st:  compute the size have to append
00559         size_t usedSize = origSyn.size();
00560         //origData not exists, add the lapCount status
00561         if(usedSize == 0){
00562             usedSize += VT_NUM_LEN;
00563         }
00564 
00565         size_t vecSize = vec.size();
00566         //first level offset for vector
00567         usedSize += VT_OFFSET_LEN;
00568         usedSize += VT_NUM_LEN + VT_OFFSET_LEN * vecSize;
00569         for(size_t i=0; i<vecSize; ++i){
00570             usedSize += vec[i].size() + 1;
00571         }
00572 
00573         // 2nd: ensure the size to copy
00574         size_t remainSize = valueSize_ - (endValPtr_ - value_);
00575         if(remainSize < usedSize){
00576             size_t copyLen = (size_t)(endValPtr_ - value_);
00577             size_t increSize = (size_t)(ceil((usedSize - remainSize) * 1.0 /
00578                     VSYN_INCRE_SIZE)) * VSYN_INCRE_SIZE;
00579             assert(increSize);
00580             valueSize_ += increSize;
00581             uint8_t* nValue = (uint8_t*)malloc(valueSize_);
00582             memcpy(nValue, value_, copyLen);
00583             free(value_);
00584             value_ = nValue;
00585             endValPtr_ = value_ + copyLen;
00586             memset(endValPtr_, 0x0, valueSize_ - copyLen);
00587 
00588             //update the origSyn
00589             if(origData > 0){
00590                 origSyn.setData(value_ + origData);
00591             }
00592         }
00593 
00594         // 3rd: copy the value
00595         int ret = endValPtr_ - value_;
00596 
00597         uint8_t* startPtr = endValPtr_;
00598         
00599         vtnum_t lapCount = origSyn.getMatchedCount();
00600         //set the lap count
00601         *reinterpret_cast<vtnum_t*>(endValPtr_) = (vtnum_t)(1 + lapCount);
00602         endValPtr_ += VT_NUM_LEN;
00603         vtoffset_t* firstOffset = (vtoffset_t*)endValPtr_;
00604         endValPtr_ += VT_OFFSET_LEN * (1 + lapCount);
00605 
00606 
00607         for(vtnum_t i=0; i<lapCount; ++i){
00608             *firstOffset++ = (vtoffset_t)(endValPtr_ - startPtr);
00609             
00610             vtnum_t wordCount = origSyn.getSynonymCount(i);
00611             *reinterpret_cast<vtnum_t*>(endValPtr_) = wordCount;
00612             endValPtr_ += VT_NUM_LEN;
00613             vtoffset_t* secondOffset = (vtoffset_t*)endValPtr_;
00614             endValPtr_ += VT_OFFSET_LEN * wordCount;
00615 
00616             //copy the words
00617             for(vtnum_t j=0; j<wordCount; ++j){
00618                 *secondOffset++ = (vtoffset_t)(endValPtr_ - startPtr);
00619                 char* word = origSyn.getWord(i, j);
00620                 do{
00621                     *endValPtr_++ = *word++;
00622                 }while(*word);
00623                 *endValPtr_++ = 0; // '\0', terminal character
00624             }
00625         }
00626 
00627         //copy the new append vector
00628         *firstOffset++ = (vtoffset_t)(endValPtr_ - startPtr);
00629         *reinterpret_cast<vtnum_t*>(endValPtr_) = (vtnum_t)(vecSize);
00630         endValPtr_ += VT_NUM_LEN;
00631         vtoffset_t* secondOffset = (vtoffset_t*)endValPtr_;
00632         endValPtr_ += VT_OFFSET_LEN * vecSize;
00633         for(size_t j=0; j<vecSize; ++j){
00634             *secondOffset++ = (vtoffset_t)(endValPtr_ - startPtr);
00635             const char* word = vec[j].data();
00636             do{
00637                 *endValPtr_++ = (uint8_t)*word++;
00638             }while(*word);
00639             *endValPtr_++ = 0; // '\0', terminal character
00640         }
00641 
00642         return ret;
00643     }
